attributes.description:
Don't wait, call now to book your test drive...
All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and an EXTRA quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our Nissan Parow Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit your needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you here on our safe and spacious showroom. Contact the Motus Nissan Parow TEAM NOW!

attributes.description:
Superb Interior and Exterior Condition. 
Complete Motus 101 Quality Checks completed on every vehicle.
All vehicles are sold with a complete service history.
Finance options are available from our dealership.
Optional extended warranties and service plans are available. 
We assist with accessory fitments such as smash and grab, tracker etc.
Price excludes dealer on the road fees. 
Mileage might have changed since time of when ad was placed. Nationwide delivery service 
available on request.  Trade ins are welcome.

attributes.description:
Finance Is Available With All The Major Banks As We Are Approved Dealers. Please Come And Visit Our Used Car Manager And Our Business Manager
They Will Be Able To Arrange A Taylor Made Deal Structure To Match Your Pocket. Trade-ins Welcome And We Pay Top Prices For Good Clean Vehicles. First Time To Finance
Our Finance And Insurance Manager Will Assist You Step By Step Throughout Your Process. There Are Great Warranty Options Available For This Vehicle And Other Great Products. Should You Require Further Information Or You Would Like To Arrange A Test Drive Please Do Not Hesitate To Contact Us At Motus Toyota Kempton Park

attributes.description:
Here are some of what the team at Motus Pinetown offers you in making the purchase of your new preowned car a positive and stress free one.
1)	We can tailor make a deal to suit you.
2)	101-point check and road worthy done on all our cars (AA Dekra).
3)	Finance department offering you the best deal from all the major banks.
4)	We also have loads of products to assist you while owning your car. Here are a few:
Service plans, maintenance plans, extended warranty, warranty booster, renew tech, tracking system, crystal fusion and safety film.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged.
